refentry.refsect1: Stability Level Unstable, unless otherwise indicated

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: TotemObject is the core object of Totem; a singleton which controls all Totem's main functions.

refsect2.title: totem_object_show_error ()
refsect2.para: Displays a non-blocking error dialog with the given title and reason .

refsect2.title: totem_object_exit ()
refsect2.para: Closes Totem.

refsect2.title: totem_object_play ()
refsect2.para: Plays the current stream. If Totem is already playing, it continues to play. If the stream cannot be played, and error dialog is displayed.

refsect2.title: totem_object_play_pause ()
refsect2.para: Gets the current MRL from the playlist and attempts to play it. If the stream is already playing, playback is paused.

refsect2.title: totem_object_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stops playback, and sets the playlist back at the start.

refsect2.title: totem_object_seek_next ()
refsect2.para: If a DVD is being played, goes to the next chapter. If a normal stream is being played, plays the next entry in the playlist.

refsect2.title: totem_object_seek_previous ()
refsect2.para: If a DVD is being played, goes to the previous chapter. If a normal stream is being played, goes to the start of the stream if possible. If seeking is not possible, plays the previous entry in the playlist.

refsect2.title: totem_object_remote_get_setting ()
refsect2.para: Returns the value of setting for this instance of Totem.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the setting is enabled, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: totem_object_remote_set_setting ()
refsect2.programlisting: void totem_object_remote_set_setting (TotemObject *totem, TotemRemoteSetting setting, gboolean value);
refsect2.para: Sets setting to value on this instance of Totem.

entry.para: the new value for the setting

refsect2.title: totem_object_seek_time ()
refsect2.programlisting: void totem_object_seek_time (TotemObject *totem, gint64 msec, gboolean accurate);
refsect2.para: Seeks to an absolute time in the stream, or displays an error dialog if that's not possible.

entry.para: whether to use accurate seek, an accurate seek might be slower for some formats (see GStreamer docs)

refsect2.title: totem_object_seek_relative ()
refsect2.programlisting: void totem_object_seek_relative (TotemObject *totem, gint64 offset, gboolean accurate);

entry.para: the time offset to seek to
whether to use accurate seek, an accurate seek might be slower for some formats (see GStreamer docs)

refsect2.title: totem_object_set_volume ()
refsect2.para: Sets the volume, with 1.0 being the maximum, and 0.0 being the minimum level.

refsect2.title: totem_object_remote_command ()
refsect2.programlisting: void totem_object_remote_command (TotemObject *totem, TotemRemoteCommand cmd, const char *url);
refsect2.para:
Executes the specified cmd on this instance of Totem. If cmd
is an operation requiring an MRL, url is required; it can be NULL otherwise.
If Totem's fullscreened and the operation is executed correctly, the controls will appear as if the user had moved the mouse.

entry.para: an MRL to play, or NULL

refsect2.title: totem_object_is_playing ()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if Totem is playing a stream.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if Totem is playing a stream

refsect2.title: totem_object_is_paused ()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if playback is paused.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if playback is paused, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: totem_object_is_seekable ()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if the current stream is seekable.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the current stream is seekable

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_main_window ()
refsect2.para: Gets Totem's main window and increments its reference count.

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_current_mrl ()
refsect2.para: Get the MRL of the current stream, or NULL if nothing's playing. Free with g_free().

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a newly-allocated string containing the MRL of the current stream

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_video_widget ()
refsect2.para: Gets Totem's video widget and increments its reference count.

refsect2.title: totem_object_set_current_subtitle ()
refsect2.para: Add the subtitle_uri subtitle file to the playlist, setting it as the subtitle for the current playlist entry.

entry.para: the URI of the subtitle file to add

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_playlist_length ()
refsect2.para: Returns the length of the current playlist.

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_playlist_pos ()
refsect2.para: Returns the 0-based index of the current entry in the playlist. If there is no current entry in the playlist, -1 is returned.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the index of the current playlist entry, or -1

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_title_at_playlist_pos ()
refsect2.para: Gets the title of the playlist entry at index .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the entry title at index , or NULL; free with g_free()

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_volume ()
refsect2.para: Gets the current volume level, as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_supported_content_types ()
refsect2.para: Get the full list of file content types which Totem supports playing.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NULL-terminated array of the content types Totem supports.

refsect2.para: Since: 3.1.5

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_supported_uri_schemes ()
refsect2.para: Get the full list of URI schemes which Totem supports accessing.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NULL-terminated array of the URI schemes Totem supports.

refsect2.para: Since: 3.1.5

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_rate ()
refsect2.para: Gets the current playback rate, with 1.0 being the normal playback rate.

refsect2.title: totem_object_set_rate ()
refsect2.para: Sets the playback rate, with 1.0 being the normal playback rate.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

refsect2.title: totem_object_add_to_playlist ()
refsect2.para: Add uri to the playlist and play it immediately.

entry.para: the URI to add to the playlist
the display name of the URI
whether to play the added item

refsect2.title: totem_object_add_to_view ()
refsect2.para: Adds a local media file to the main view.

entry.para: a title for the media, or NULL

refsect2.title: totem_object_clear_playlist ()
refsect2.para: Empties the current playlist.

refsect2.title: totem_object_empty_menu_section ()
refsect2.para: Empty the GMenu section pointed to by id , and remove any related actions. Note that menu items with specific target will not have the associated action removed.

entry.para: the ID for the menu section to empty

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_current_time ()
refsect2.para: Gets the current position's time in the stream as a gint64.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the current position in the stream

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_menu_section ()
refsect2.para: Get the GMenu of the given id from the main Totem GtkBuilder file.

entry.para: the ID for the menu section to look up

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GMenu or NULL on failure.

refsect2.title: totem_object_get_short_title ()
refsect2.para: Gets the title of the current entry in the playlist.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the current entry's title, or NULL; free with g_free()

refsect2.title: totem_object_is_fullscreen ()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if Totem is fullscreened.

refsect2.title: totem_object_next_angle ()
refsect2.para: Switches to the next angle, if watching a DVD. If not watching a DVD, this is a no-op.

refsect2.title: totem_object_pause ()
refsect2.para: Pauses the current stream. If Totem is already paused, it continues to be paused.

refsect2.title: Totem
refsect2.para: The Totem object is a handy synonym for TotemObject, and the two can be used interchangably.

refsect2.title: TotemObject
refsect2.para: All the fields in the TotemObject structure are private and should never be accessed directly.

refsect2.title: enum TotemRemoteCommand
refsect2.para: Represents a command which can be sent to a running Totem instance remotely.

entry.para: toggle play/pause on the current stream
seek forwards in the current stream
seek backwards in the current stream
replace an item in the playlist
play a DVD in a drive

refsect2.title: enum TotemRemoteSetting
refsect2.para: Represents a boolean setting or preference on a remote Totem instance.

refsect2.title: TOTEM_GSETTINGS_SCHEMA
refsect2.para: The GSettings schema under which all Totem settings are stored.
